name: reob
description: Remote objects - Create backends for one page web apps with ease. Uses mongo and express.

scripts.clean-m: find s*/ -type f -name '*.js' -delete && find s*/ -type f -name '*.d.ts' -delete && find s*/ -type f -name '*.js.map' -delete && rm -rf dist
scripts.clean: npm run clean-m && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .tscache
scripts.copy: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r s*c dist && find dist -type f  -name '*.ts' ! -iname '*.d.ts' -delete
scripts.doc: typedoc --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --noEmit --exclude src/Internal.ts --exclude node_modules --mode file --out doc -p tsconfig.json src typings
scripts.upload: npm run clean && yarn install && npm run compile && npm run test && npm version patch && npm publish
